extensionDescription.message: Create shortcuts for messages usually used by you to be sent quickly on chat.

btnClick0_1.message: Direct send, deleting content of the chat bar/box

btnClick1_1.message: Direct send, add to the content of the chat bar/box

btnClick2_1.message: Don't send, deleting content of the chat bar/box

btnClick4_1.message: Don't send, add to the content of the chat bar/box

btnClick0_2.message: Direct send, deleting content of the chat bar/box

btnClick1_2.message: Direct send, add to the content of the chat bar/box

btnClick2_2.message: Don't send, deleting content of the chat bar/box

btnClick3_2.message: Don't send, add to the content of the chat bar/box

descriptionDelete.message: Do you really want to delete the message "$1"?

descriptionCheckMeetStarts.message: How often milliseconds the extension will check if the meeting already started.

waitToAppend.message: Wait for append buttons on the chat

descriptionWaitToAppend.message: How many milliseconds the extension need to wait to append the buttons.

reloadWarning.message: You need to reload the Google Meet tab to apply this setting.
reloadWarning.description: Showed when you try to change the values for CheckMeetStarts and WaitToAppend

credits.message: Developed by Enzo (enzon19). See this project on GitHub. Make an donation here.

welcomeTitle.description: Título da página welcome.html na tag title

welcomePageTitle.description: Complemento ao nome da extensão na página welcome.html

step1_1.message: Click on the icon of the extension on the address bar.

step1_2.message: Create your own shortcuts to send later on a meet.

step1_3.message: Go to a meeting on Google Meet and use the buttons on the chat to send the messages.

step2_1.message: You can edit or delete the shortcuts. The changes will be applied immediately.

descriptionSets.message: If you want, you can choose more than one set of messages to start using.

step3_1.message: Change the roundness of the buttons on the chat and their position.

step3_2.message: You can personalize the time for the extension wait for append buttons on the chat and for check for the meeting starts.

step3_3.message: Change what happens when you click on the buttons using the right or left mouse button.

warnings.message:
• The extension isn't enable for private windows by default, enable this on the browser settings;
• Don't use the extension for flood or spam;
• The owner of the extension isn't responsible for bad use or any banning, use this extension for your own.

If you have any bug or recommendation, please report them on extension's GitHub page.

creditsComplete.message: Developed by Enzo (enzon19). Design made using MUI. See this project on GitHub. Make an donation here.
